answers.answer: Hello,I've just found at the internet about this drug Metformin, in the description of drug, that should be watched out with people with liver and heart problems. Who would know? I dont understand  some things. Is it possible that the medication could affect the replication of the virus, but at the same time to be bad for the liver? Please some Doctor give us the answer!!!!
It looks promising and interesting but obviously too early to tell where it will go. It will be good to hear the results of their trials when they have gotten to that point.- Dave

There has been a lot of recent theory and discussion regarding the impact of both the presence of diabetes and the use of diabetic meds on hcv infection and treatment, but no consensus as yet, it seems.  If you search the MH archives you'll find loads of discussion among some really knowledgable members on the topic (with research literature references as well). ~eureka
